  4. City Council District A

City Council District A

Council Member Bill Powell- District A

councila@levellandtexas.org


Bill Powell was elected to the City Council in May of 2024. 

Council Member Powell is the Director of the South Plains Community Action Association. He is married to Kay and has two grown sons.
